dct_title_s: Magnum MARE del ZUR cum Insula CALIFORNIA. De Groote ZUYD-ZEE en't Eylandt CALIFORNIA
dct_description_sm: 1715, issued by L. Renard, unchanged except for imprint: Gedruckt't Amsterdam by L. Renard (bottom right)

California as an island with indented northern coast. Title cartouche (lower right) with portrait of Magellan and winged cherubs above, and with Neptune and female riding horses on the water. Title in Latin and Dutch.
L.C. 485, 559, & 592; Wagner 411 & 507; Tooley 40 and 41; Leighly 67; Koeman,IV, M.Wit1(21), Ren1(22),Ren2(22) & Ren3(22).
From: Atlas de la Navigation, et du Commerce qui se fait dans toutes les parties du monde / Louis Renard, 1715 and 1739.
